    • Method Detail

      • listNamespaces

        public List<String> listNamespaces(String master)
        Description copied from interface: ITagModelParameter
        Lists the namespace identifiers that are present for the given master. A namespace is associated with a training corpus, the result of a feature selection, a trained model and a flag indicating the state of the model.
        Specified by:
        listNamespaces in interface ITagModelParameter
        Parameters:
        master - The master to list namespaces for.
        Returns:
        The namespace names.

      • addNamespace

        public void addNamespace(String master,
                String namespace)
        Description copied from interface: ITagModelParameter
        Creates a new namespace for the given master. The namespace initially contains an empty training corpus, a default feature list and no model. The modelStatus is set to NO_MODEL. If a namespace of the same name already exists for the given master, an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
        Specified by:
        addNamespace in interface ITagModelParameter
        Parameters:
        master - The master to create the namespace for.
        namespace - The name of the namespace that will be created.

      • removeNamespace

        public void removeNamespace(String master,
                   String namespace)
        Description copied from interface: ITagModelParameter
        Removes a given namespace. This will also erase all data associated with the namespace, i.e., training corpus, model, etc. If the given namespace does not exist for the given master, the method logs a warning and does nothing.
        Specified by:
        removeNamespace in interface ITagModelParameter
        Parameters:
        master - The master that contains the namespace.
        namespace - The namespace to be deleted.

      • setTrainingDocuments

        public List<TrainingDocument> setTrainingDocuments(String master,
                                          String namespace,
                                          Collection<TrainingDocument> newDocuments)
        Description copied from interface: ITagModelParameter
        Sets the training corpus to the specified set of TrainingDocuments and assigns each document an unique ID. TrainingDocuments can be created from CDocuments by calling the TrainingDocuments.fromDocument(de.ityx.contex.interfaces.document.CDocument, boolean) method.

        If a TrainingDocuments object occurs multiple times in the collection, it will only be added once.

        Each given TrainingDocument must have a CDocument linked in its content property. If the document property of any content is null, an IllegalArgumentException will be thrown.

        The documents that are passed to the function must have their internal ID property set to 0.
        The call returns a list with copies of the passed TrainingDocuments. Each of the TrainingDocuments returned has its ID property set to the newly-assigned internal ID.
        This ID can be used to retrieve the document from the database at a later time or save modifications.

        WARNING: The specified documents will replace the previous training corpus. The documents of the previous corpus will be deleted.

        Annotation format

        Annotations in the training documents are stored as TagMatches. The identifier of such a TagMatch must be structured as follows:

        (prefix)(label ID)

        ... where (prefix) is the prefix string ITagModelParameter.LABEL_PREFIX and (label ID) is the internal ID of the label that the TagMatch is annotated with. The internal ID must identify one of that labels that are returned by the getLabels() method.
        Specified by:
        setTrainingDocuments in interface ITagModelParameter
        Parameters:
        master - identification of the training corpus to use
        namespace - identification of the training corpus to use
        newDocuments - the new documents of the training corpus
        Returns:
        copies of the given TrainingDocuments with their id properties set to the newly generated unique IDs.

      • addTrainingDocuments

        public List<TrainingDocument> addTrainingDocuments(String master,
                                          String namespace,
                                          Collection<TrainingDocument> newDocuments)
        Description copied from interface: ITagModelParameter
        Adds new TrainingDocuments to the training corpus for the current profile. TrainingDocuments can be created from CDocuments by calling the TrainingDocuments.fromDocument(de.ityx.contex.interfaces.document.CDocument, boolean) method.

        The documents that are passed to the function must have their internal ID property set to 0.
        The call returns a list with copies of the passed TrainingDocuments. Each of the TrainingDocuments returned has its ID property set to the newly-assigned internal ID.
        This ID can be used to retrieve the document from the database at a later time or save modifications.

        Each given TrainingDocument must have a CDocument linked in its content property. If the document property of any content is null, an IllegalArgumentException will be thrown.
        See ITagModelParameter.setTrainingDocuments(String, String, java.util.Collection) for a description of the annotation format.
        Specified by:
        addTrainingDocuments in interface ITagModelParameter
        Parameters:
        master - identification of the training corpus to use
        namespace - identification of the training corpus to use
        newDocuments - the documents to be added to the training corpus
        Returns:
        copies of the given TrainingDocuments with their id properties set to the newly generated unique IDs.

      • addTrainingDocument

        public TrainingDocument addTrainingDocument(String master,
                                   String namespace,
                                   TrainingDocument newDocument)
        Description copied from interface: ITagModelParameter
        Adds a single TrainingDocument to the training corpus for the current profile. TrainingDocuments can be created from CDocuments by calling the TrainingDocuments.fromDocument(de.ityx.contex.interfaces.document.CDocument, boolean) method.

        The given TrainingDocument must have a CDocument linked in its content property. If the document property of any content is null, an IllegalArgumentException will be thrown.
        See setTrainingDocuments() for a description of the annotation format.
        Specified by:
        addTrainingDocument in interface ITagModelParameter
        Parameters:
        master - identification of the training corpus to use
        namespace - identification of the training corpus to use
        newDocument - the documents to be added to the training corpus
        Returns:
        a copy of the given TrainingDocument with its id property set to the newly generated unique ID.

      • updateTrainingDocuments

        public ModelStatus updateTrainingDocuments(String master,
                                  String namespace,
                                  Collection<TrainingDocument> updatedDocuments)
        Description copied from interface: ITagModelParameter
        Updates one or more TrainingDocuments in the training corpus.
        Each of the items given in updatedDocuments will replace the TrainingDocument in the corpus with the matching IDs.
        If the content property is a CDocument, that CDocument will replace the content previously stored.
        If the content property is a null, the previously stored CDocument will not be changed.

        Documents must already have been added to the training corpus to be updated. If an ID from updatedDocuments has no matching document in the training corpus, an IllegalArgumentException will be thrown.
        Specified by:
        updateTrainingDocuments in interface ITagModelParameter
        Parameters:
        master - identification of the training corpus to use.
        namespace - identification of the training corpus to use.
        updatedDocuments - the documents to update.
        Returns:
        the new status of the training corpus and model after this operation. (The result is identical to calling getModelStatus() immediately after this method)

      • updateTrainingDocument

        public ModelStatus updateTrainingDocument(String master,
                                 String namespace,
                                 TrainingDocument updatedDocument)
        Description copied from interface: ITagModelParameter
        Updates a single TrainingDocument in the training corpus.
        The given updatedDocument will replace the TrainingDocument in the corpus with the matching ID.
        If the content property is a CDocument, that CDocument will replace the content previously stored.
        If the content property is a null, the previously stored CDocument will not be changed.

        Documents must already have been added to the training corpus to be updated. If an ID from updatedDocuments has no matching document in the training corpus, an IllegalArgumentException will be thrown.
        Specified by:
        updateTrainingDocument in interface ITagModelParameter
        Parameters:
        master - identification of the training corpus to use.
        namespace - identification of the training corpus to use.
        updatedDocument - the document to update.
        Returns:
        the new status of the training corpus and model after this operation. (The result is identical to calling getModelStatus() immediately after this method)

      • listAllTrainingDocuments

        public Set<TrainingDocument> listAllTrainingDocuments(String master,
                                             String namespace)
        Description copied from interface: ITagModelParameter
        Returns the URIs and metadata of all documents in the training corpus. The content property in the returned TrainingDocuments is null. To retrieve the actual CDocuments, call fetchTrainingDocuments() with any of the URLs returned by this method.
        Specified by:
        listAllTrainingDocuments in interface ITagModelParameter
        Parameters:
        master - identification of the training corpus to use.
        namespace - identification of the training corpus to use.
        Returns:
        TrainingDocuments that contain the URLs and metadata of all documents in the training corpus.

      • addLabel

        public Label addLabel(String master,
             String namespace,
             Label labelToAdd)
        Description copied from interface: ITagModelParameter
        Adds the given label to the current training corpus and assigns a unique ID. The given label must have its id property set to 0. The call returns a copy of the label with the id property set to the new id of the label in the database.
        Specified by:
        addLabel in interface ITagModelParameter
        Parameters:
        master - identification of the training corpus to use.
        namespace - identification of the training corpus to use.
        labelToAdd - the new label.
        Returns:
        copy of the label that was added, with id property set to the label's id.

      • updateLabel

        public ModelStatus updateLabel(String master,
                      String namespace,
                      Label label)
        Description copied from interface: ITagModelParameter
        Updates properties of the given label from the current training corpus. The label is identified through it's id property. The label in the database with the matching id property will be replaced by the given label. A matching label must already exist in the database - if no label with a matching id is found, an IllegalArgumentException is thrown.
        Specified by:
        updateLabel in interface ITagModelParameter
        Parameters:
        master - identification of the training corpus to use.
        namespace - identification of the training corpus to use.
        label - the new state of the label that should be updated.
        Returns:
        the new status of the training corpus and model after this operation. (The result is identical to calling getModelStatus() immediately after this method)

      • evaluate

        public void evaluate(String master,
            String namespace)
        Description copied from interface: ITagTrainerService
        Performs a cross-validation on the training corpus using the parameters determined by optimize() If optimize() was not run yet, default parameters will be used. The result of the cross-validation is output by logging.
        Specified by:
        evaluate in interface ITagTrainerService
        Parameters:
        master - identification of the training corpus to use.
        namespace - identification of the training corpus to use.

      • train

        public ModelStatus train(String master,
                String namespace)
        Description copied from interface: ITagTrainerService
        Trains an ER classifier on the training corpus of the given master/namespace tuple without a feature selection. This is equivalent to train(master, namespace, false). This may be faster than train with optimize but maybe more accurate on new data.
        Specified by:
        train in interface ITagTrainerService
        Parameters:
        master - identification of the training corpus and features to use
        namespace - identification of the training corpus and features to use
        Returns:
        the new status of the training corpus and model after this operation. (The result is identical to calling getModelStatus() immediately after this method)

      • train

        public ModelStatus train(String master,
                String namespace,
                boolean optimize)
        Description copied from interface: ITagTrainerService
        Trains an ER classifier on the training corpus of the given master/namespace tuple. If the parameter optimize is true a feature selection is performed before the real training. This can take a very long time.
        Specified by:
        train in interface ITagTrainerService
        Parameters:
        master - identification of the training corpus and features to use.
        namespace - identification of the training corpus and features to use.
        optimize - perform feature selection before training.
        Returns:
        the new status of the training corpus and model after this operation. (The result is identical to calling getModelStatus() immediately after this method)

      • getModelStatus

        public ModelStatus getModelStatus(String master,
                         String namespace)
        Description copied from interface: ITagModelParameter
        Indicates the current state of the model for a given master and namespace. @see ModelStatus for a detailed description of the states.
        Specified by:
        getModelStatus in interface ITagModelParameter

      • exportConfiguration

        public String exportConfiguration(String master)
        Description copied from interface: ITagTrainerService
        Export an ITag configuration denoted by master. Exported are the models and training corpora of all namespaces contained within the given master. This method may return a HUGE string of xml.
        Specified by:
        exportConfiguration in interface ITagModelParameter
        Specified by:
        exportConfiguration in interface ITagTrainerService
        Parameters:
        master - The master the ITag was defined in.
        Returns:
        The configuration serialized as xml. Attention this string may be huge.

      • importConfiguration

        public void importConfiguration(String master,
                       String xmlConfiguration,
                       boolean deleteExistingData)
        Description copied from interface: ITagTrainerService
        Import an ITag configuration and associate ith with the given master. If deleteExistingData is true, ALL namespaces that are present in the master are deleted before import. If deleteExistingData is false, the new namespaces from the import will be added to the existing content of the master. In this case, no namespace with the same name as one that should be imported must be present, otherwise an IllegalArgumentException is thrown and the import is rolled back.
        Specified by:
        importConfiguration in interface ITagModelParameter
        Specified by:
        importConfiguration in interface ITagTrainerService
        Parameters:
        master - the master the ITag should be added to.
        xmlConfiguration - the ITag configuration to import. This is a string containing XML as returned by ITagTrainerService.exportConfiguration(String).
        deleteExistingData - Remove all existing namespaces of the given master before import.

      • getModelPerformance

        public ModelPerformance getModelPerformance(String master,
                                   String namespace)
        Description copied from interface: ITagModelParameter
        Returns the performance measures for an ER model evaluated in a given master/namespace tuple.
        Specified by:
        getModelPerformance in interface ITagModelParameter
        Parameters:
        master - identification of the training corpus and features to use.
        namespace - identification of the training corpus and features to use.
        Returns:
        the model performance measures for an ER model evaluated in a given master/namespace tuple.

      • getLastConfigurationChange

        public long getLastConfigurationChange(String master,
                              String namespace)
        Description copied from interface: ITagModelParameter
        Reads a timestamp of the last time that the training corpus was modified.
        Specified by:
        getLastConfigurationChange in interface ITagModelParameter
        Parameters:
        master - The master of the corpus that should be queried.
        namespace - The namespace of the corpus that should be queried.
        Returns:
        A timestamp value in the format returned by DBnt.getTime() If the last modification time is not known, a value of ITagModelParameter.LAST_CONFIGURATION_CHANGE_UNKNOWN is returned.
